creditline: The Marguerite S. McNally Endowment Fund for Art Acquisition
description: diptych, framed in white frames; images of young man with short black hair wearing an earring, necklace and maroon shirt, with his arms around the shoulders of a young woman wearing large silver hoop earrings, black and tan cap, and a tan and white striped button-down shirt; each image taken from a slightly different vantage point and overlapping views, so both photos do not make a continuous image
dimension:
23 5/8 × 20 5/8 in. (60.01 × 52.39 cm) (object part, left image, approx., a)
23 7/8 × 20 1/2 in. (60.64 × 52.07 cm) (object part, right image, approx., b)
30 × 26 1/16 × 2 in. (76.2 × 66.2 × 5.08 cm) (outer frame, each)
title: Nikki and Manting
